docs.lead_paragraph: PERHAPS the simplest of the coming-out frocks of the past few days was that of Miss Marie Louise Peckham, who, like so many of the other debutantes, has recently returned from Europe.
docs.snippet: PERHAPS the simplest of the coming-out frocks of the past few days was that of Miss Marie Louise Peckham, who, like so many of the other debutantes, has recently returned from Europe.
